featured.text: Dolphins, like us, have to breathe air.
Now you can buy tuna with the label “dolphin-free tuna.”
They wrote letters to the tuna companies and supermarkets asking them to find a way to spare dolphins.
So in many parts of the world dolphins and fishermen are in __32__ for tuna.

other.text: Dolphins, like most of us, love to eat tuna.
Unfortunately, they __35__ catch many dolphins at the same time.
In the past, there wasn’t much conflict __33__ dolphins and fishermen, because the numbers of tuna in the ocean were enormous.

definition.zh_def: 海豚：一種智力高、社交性強的海洋哺乳動物，屬於鯨目，通常以群體生活，並以魚類和其他海洋生物為食。
definition.en_def: Dolphin: A highly intelligent and social marine mammal belonging to the order Cetacea, typically living in groups and feeding on fish and other marine organisms.
definition.example: The dolphin jumped gracefully out of the water.
